text: Onsen Egg Promise Day 11 + furniture bubble tracker — the Day 1–5, Day 6+, and snowman bubble maps keep the hunt tidy and help you land the next cracked egg loop without missing a single sparkle.
Fluorite on Plot 2, Roaming Oak on Plot 5, Vanya's stall egg, and the furniture bubble at the lifeguard shack—keep these four stops in rotation and the snow keeps you supplied.
Collab CP Day 1 is live! Follow the Heartopia account, repost the announcement, and swipe the raffle link for a shot at e-money and official merch drops.
Still a cozy cabin, but the place is growing fast with new gear and collab vibes—just the kind of home we love for the rotating bubble hunts.
